text: The 2015 CIS Women's Final 8 Basketball Tournament was held March 12–15, 2015, in Quebec City, Quebec.2015 ArcelorMittal Dofasco CIS women’s basketball championship: Defending champ Lancers seeded No. 1, Alberta earns wildcard It was hosted by Université Laval at the PEPS Gymnasium, marking the fourth time Laval has hosted, and the fourth time the tournament has been played in Quebec City. ==Participating Teams== CIS list of participating teams {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- bgcolor="#efefef" align=center !align=left |Seed !align=left | Team !align=left | Qualified |- align=center |align=left|1 | Windsor Lancers | Ontario University Champion |- align=center |align=left|2 | UBC Thunderbirds | Canada West Champion |- align=center |align=left|3 | McGill Martlets | Quebec University Champion |- align=center |align=left|4 | Saskatchewan Huskies | Canada West Finalist |- align=center |align=left|5 | Alberta Pandas | Canada West Bronze Medalist |- align=center |align=left|6 | Saint Mary's Huskies | Atlantic University Champion |- align=center |align=left|7 | Ryerson Rams | Ontario University Finalist |- align=center |align=left|8 | Laval Rouge et Or | Host (Quebec University Semi-Finalist) |} ==Championship Bracket== ==Consolation Bracket== == See also == 2015 CIS Men's Basketball Championship == References == == External links == * Tournament Web Site Category:U Sports Women's Basketball Championship Category:2014–15 in Canadian basketball Category:2015 in women's basketball
title: 2015 CIS Women's Basketball Championship
